CustomField.description: Formula returns value for New ARR: OEM when an opportunity is closed won.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Term__c > 0, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Opportunity.Account.OEM__c) )) /* Only OEM */ ), Total_Sales_Price_ARR__c, NULL )
CustomField.label: New ARR: OEM
